sentences.en: And to self - production of gasoline scooters, gasoline engine, cutting irrigation machines, Hedgerow machines.
sentences.cn: 并且能自营生产汽油滑板车 、 汽油机 、 割灌机 、 绿篱机等.

sentences.en: He crouched behind a low hedgerow.
sentences.cn: 他蹲在一排低矮的树篱后面。

sentences.en: In the Northwest, they are being planted by hedgerow on seedling roots, clonal and dwarfing stocks.
sentences.cn: 在西北部地区用灌木树篱把它接在实生砧 、 无性砧及矮化砧上.

sentences.en: Light interception and distribution in hedgerow orchards with different alleyway widths is indicated in Fig . 56.
sentences.cn: 图56显示篱壁果园不同行间宽度的光能截取和分配的情况.

sentences.en: More than a hundred thousand miles of hedgerow have been lost since 1945.
sentences.cn: 自1945年以来，已有10万多英里的树篱被砍掉了。

sentences.en: The leaves, still green, were tossed off the hedgerow trees By the wind.
sentences.cn: 仍然还是绿色的叶子, 被风吹得从灌木篱笆上飘落下来.

sentences.en: There is more violence in an English hedgerow than meanest streets of a great city.
sentences.cn: 在英格兰灌木丛中发生的暴力事件,远比大城市中治安状况恶劣的街区所发生的要多.

sentences.en: Using vetiver grass hedgerow erodedlanderoded hill ecologic system rehabilitation through soil and vegetation restoration.
sentences.cn: 分析了香根草篱带种植后植被与土壤变化过程,介绍了草篱带建立的方法.

trans.tran_en: a line of bushes growing along the edge of a field or road
